content.question: Based on the data shown in the graph, when would the species richness of the ecosystem have been the lowest?

choices.label: One to four years after the volcanic eruption
Four to ten years after the volcanic eruption
Ten to fourteen years after the volcanic eruption

content.answer: One to four years after the volcanic eruption

skill.text: Skill 5.C: Explain patterns and trends in data to draw conclusions.
